column1:
Not worse.. but different

The contagious rating for both are almost equal
With this virus at 1.4-2.5 and ebola at 2
SARS was 4 (also a corona virus variant)

Ebola is deadlier, but it was also in an area with less international people and travelers 

I wonder where it will stop
